property.name: childObjectApiName
property.label: Child Object API Name
property.description: API name of the child object (e.g., Hospital_Affiliation__c)

property.name: parentLookupField
property.label: Parent Lookup Field API Name
property.description: API name of the lookup field in child object (e.g., Provider__c)

property.name: fieldsToDisplay
property.label: Fields to Display
property.description: Comma-separated list of field API names (e.g., Name,Status__c,Start_Date__c)

property.name: columnLabels
property.label: Column Labels
property.description: Optional: Comma-separated list of custom column labels matching fields order

property.name: searchableFields
property.label: Searchable Fields
property.description: Comma-separated list of field API names to enable search

property.name: sortableFields
property.label: Sortable Fields
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields that should be sortable

property.name: recordsPerPage
property.label: Records Per Page
property.description: Number of records to display per page (1-100)

property.name: flowName
property.label: Flow API Name
property.description: API name of the flow to launch (optional)

property.name: flowTitle
property.label: Flow Modal Title
property.description: Title to display on the flow modal

property.name: listTitle
property.label: List Title
property.description: Custom title for the related list. If blank, uses '[Object] Related List'
